name: @heys/web
description: HEYS Web Application - Main web interface

scripts.prebuild: node ../../scripts/sync-iw-inline-config.cjs && node scripts/bundle-advice.cjs && node scripts/bundle-day.cjs && node scripts/update-version.cjs && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const f=process.cwd()+'/public/sw.js';let c=fs.readFileSync(f,'utf8');c=c.replace(/heys-[\w.-]+/,'heys-'+Date.now());fs.writeFileSync(f,c);console.log('SW version:',Date.now())"
scripts.build: pnpm run prebuild && pnpm run build:react && vite build && node scripts/strip-console-logs.js && cp heys_*.js dist/ && cp react-bundle.js dist/ && mkdir -p dist/styles/modules && cp styles/*.css dist/styles/ && cp styles/modules/*.css dist/styles/modules/ && cp -r advice/*.js dist/advice/ && cp -r day/*.js dist/day/ && cp -r widgets/*.js dist/widgets/
scripts.build:deps: pnpm --dir ../.. --filter @heys/shared run build && pnpm --dir ../.. --filter @heys/storage run build && pnpm --dir ../.. --filter @heys/core run build && pnpm --dir ../.. --filter @heys/search run build && pnpm --dir ../.. --filter @heys/ui run build && pnpm --dir ../.. --filter @heys/logger run build
scripts.build:vercel: pnpm run prebuild && vite build && cp heys_*.js dist/ && mkdir -p dist/styles && cp styles/*.css dist/styles/
scripts.dev:full: concurrently -k -n web,iw "pnpm run dev" "pnpm run dev:iw-config"
scripts.test:ci: NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' VITEST_MAX_THREADS=1 VITEST_MIN_THREADS=1 pnpm exec vitest run --no-coverage
